name: Basic Plan
description: The Basic Plan is perfect for first-time visitors or those looking for a quick, one-day workout. It provides all the essential amenities without any long-term commitment.

name: Premium Plan
description: The Premium Plan is designed for fitness enthusiasts who want complete access to all gym facilities and exclusive services. Ideal for those who are committed to their fitness journey and want added benefits.
features: Guest pass for one friend (1 day)
Access to advanced equipment (HIIT, Cardio machines)

name: Family Plan
description: The Family Plan offers everything for family-focused gym-goers, from flexible access to personal training sessions to special family-only facilities and events. Perfect for those looking for a more personalized gym experience for the whole family.
